text: 22.37: Ais 53.12; Mk 15.28; Ru 22.52Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, Fhe Bakɨmen buni vhuuiŋ ki gavar ki kameŋ khaŋ nzuai, ‘Kha gumgi gu mbigi, mbe ana garav khaŋ ana nzuai, ana vhɨra guma mbatɨk ma.’ Gu nde nzuai, mba tɨv nan hɨgɨrga. Ahaŋ, mba nan hɨr za suaŋgi buni, nta Fhe Bakɨme bunin vhuuiŋ ki gavar ki, mba bigi nta nan hɨgɨrga.”
